metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4781 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Heap-based Buffer Overflow in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.1873.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-4781` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:9.0.1000-4ubuntu3.2
vim-athena - 2:9.0.1000-4ubuntu3.2
vim-common - 2:9.0.1000-4ubuntu3.2
vim-gtk3 - 2:9.0.1000-4ubuntu3.2
vim-gui-common - 2:9.0.1000-4ubuntu3.2
vim-motif - 2:9.0.1000-4ubuntu3.2
vim-nox - 2:9.0.1000-4ubuntu3.2
vim-runtime - 2:9.0.1000-4ubuntu3.2
vim-tiny - 2:9.0.1000-4ubuntu3.2
xxd - 2:9.0.1000-4ubuntu3.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:9.0.1000-4ubuntu3.2').
